name: Mind Control Deprogramming
description: Techniques for identifying and reversing cultic and ritualistic programming to restore independent thought and sovereignty.

cards.title: Recognizing Cultic Programming
cards.description: Understanding how cultic systems use psychological conditioning to control thought patterns and behavior.
cards.summaryText: Surfaces the trigger cycles, trauma conditioning, and structural patterns that reveal active programming.

cards.title: Techniques for Mental Deprogramming
cards.description: Methods to break free from conditioned responses and cultic belief enforcement mechanisms.
bulletpoints: Using cognitive reframing to shift mental paradigms.
Breaking trauma bonds and psychological dependency loops.
Implementing reality-checking protocols and self-validation techniques.
cards.summaryText: Provides reframing drills, trauma bond release, and reality-check routines to unwind enforced beliefs.

cards.title: Rebuilding Mental Autonomy
cards.description: Strategies for reclaiming personal agency and independent critical thinking.
bulletpoints: Overcoming gaslighting and external thought control.
Using meditation and self-awareness exercises for clarity.
cards.summaryText: Emphasizes rebuilding self-led thinking, resisting gaslighting, and using reflective practices to cement autonomy.
